abstract: China has muscled in on miner BHP Billiton‘s attempts to buy rival Rio Tinto, with its biggest aluminum producer teaming up with U.S. group Alcoa to buy a 12 percent stake in Rio.
lead_paragraph: China has muscled in on miner BHP Billiton‘s attempts to buy rival Rio Tinto, with its biggest aluminum producer teaming up with U.S. group Alcoa to buy a 12 percent stake in Rio.

headline.main: Chinalco Teams With Alcoa to Take Stake in Rio Tinto
